content: stylish fingerless mittens with gusset increases and a seed stitch pattern running over the outer three fingers curled up stockinette edges add a playful touch **may 2024** an updated version is now published should you wish to receive the 1 0 version do not hesitate to contact me disclaimer i am not a professional pattern maker but simply want to share my successful personal projects and experiments in pattern form with the knitting community as such the first version of this pattern had some errors with this new version i hope to have made improvements of course i am always open to receive feedback on this version too since knitting is not my job i may not be able to create an updated pdf immediately but for bigger issues i will at least try to add an errata note to the pattern page =================================== **yarn ** approximately 90-100 meters aran weight shown in katia concept cotton merino 70% cotton 30% merino wool **needles ** us 8/5 mm dpns or circular needles for your preferred method of knitting small circumferences in the round use cable length of at least 32 inches/80 cm to do magic loop **gauge ** 18 stitches x 34 row = 10x10 cm **notions ** stitch markers scrap yarn also check out my page on ko-fi you can find patterns there too or you can tip me whatever you d like no pressure though just enjoy the pattern - tagging suggestions #matsyseedstitchmittens #madebymatsypatterns
